children.description: The contents of the item. Usually the link label or icon.
children.description_zh: 项目的内容。通常是链接标签或图标。

color.type: foreground / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

separator.description: The item custom separator. It is a chevron by default.
separator.description_zh: 项自定义分隔符。默认情况下，它是 V 形。

isCurrent.description: Whether the item is the current/active one.
isCurrent.description_zh: 项目是否为当前/活动项目。

isLast.description: Whether the item is the last one.
isLast.description_zh: 项目是否为最后一个项目。

hideSeparator.description: Whether to hide the item separator.

disableAnimation.description: Whether the item should display animations.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the item slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为项目槽设置自定义类名。

events.name: onPress
events.description: Handler called when the press is released over the target.
events.description_zh: 当压力机释放到目标上方时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressStart
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction starts.
events.description_zh: 在新闻交互开始时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressEnd
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction ends, either over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.
events.description_zh: 当按下交互结束时（在目标上方或指针离开目标时）调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Handler called when a key is pressed.
events.description_zh: 按下某个键时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyUp
events.description: Handler called when a key is released.
events.description_zh: 释放密钥时调用的处理程序。

slots.name: data-current
slots.description: When the breadcrumb item is the current item. Based on breadcrumb isCurrent prop or on whether the item is the last one.
slots.description_zh: 当痕迹导航项为当前项时。基于面包屑 isCurrent 属性或项目是否是最后一个。

slots.name: data-disabled
slots.description: When the breadcrumb item is disabled. Based on breadcrumb isDisabled prop.
slots.description_zh: 禁用痕迹导航项时。基于面包屑 isDisabled 道具。

slots.name: data-focus
slots.description: When the breadcrumb item is being focused. Based on useFocusRing
slots.description_zh: 当面包屑项目被聚焦时。基于 useFocusRing

slots.name: data-focus-visible
slots.description: When the breadcrumb item is being focused with the keyboard. Based on useFocusRing
slots.description_zh: 当面包屑项目被键盘聚焦时。基于 useFocusRing
